options.name: Fledgling Primalist
options.description: You have trained to channel primal spells. Gain +1 skill with primal magic.

options.name: Action : Kinesis
options.description: You make a ranged spell attack using your primal magic skill at a target within a short (10 unit) distance. For each dice that hits, deal 3 arcane damage.

options.name: Reaction : Draw Nature
options.description: In response to taking heat, cold or lightning damage from a spell or effect, you absorb the extra energy. Until the end of your next turn, the first primal spell you channel is charged.

options.name: Of the Elements
options.description: You are attuned to the elements and gain +1 mitigation to heat, cold and lightning damage.

options.name: Anchored
options.description: You are naturally anchored to the world, gaining +1 skill with endurance and making you immune from stun or daze conditions caused by lightning effects. Additionally, you gain seismic detection when standing on natural terrain.

options.name: Studied Magic
options.description: Your experience with primal magic has led to greater understanding. Gain +1 skill with magic knowledge and +1 spell capacity.

options.name: Skilled Primalist
options.description: You have trained extensively with primal spells. Gain +1 skill with primal magic.

options.name: Daily Action : Primal Overcharge
options.description: You channel a primal spell that deals damage, but the damage dealt and the energy required are both doubled. This ability only works in natural environments.

options.name: Reaction : Dampen Elements
options.description: In response to an effect or spell that deals either heat, cold or lightning damage, reduce the strength of the elements in a 3 unit radius around you by 2d4 damage.

options.name: Talented Primalist
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with primal magic spells.
